title: "Memory Maze"
description: "A collaborative project for semester long project in Software Design and Development where we used a maze algorithm to create a game. The game structure shows the user a random maze based on the difficultly level and has the user try to memorize it in a set amount of time. Then the use has a scrolled-in view of the maze and must navigate through the finish."
